actions.text: By unanimous consent, the Chabot amendment was withdrawn.
Amendment (A072) offered by Mr. Chabot to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A072) offered by Mr. Chabot to the Rules amendment (A001).

amends_amendment.description: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.
amends_amendment.purpose: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.

description: An amendment No. 58 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to amend certain sections of Title 49 of the U.S. Code to increase penalties relating to commercial motor vehicle safety.
purpose: An amendment No. 58 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to amend certain sections of Title 49 of the U.S. Code to increase penalties relating to commercial motor vehicle safety.
